Author: Joshi Datta  \cite{Joshi2003}
Approach: Sheet metal feature regognition then suppression
Limitations: Limited to only holes fillets and bosses

Author: Liu et al. \cite{Liu2004}
Input: Sheet metal feature based CAD model
Approach: Classification into Primitives (independent); Add-ons; Connectors and Composites.

Author: Sunil \cite{Sunil2008}
Approach: Recognized and classified into face-based (holes; dimple; and beads); edge-based features (flange; ridge)  and transitive features (bend)
